Liste de publications

Mes données bibliométriques sont disponibles sur mon profil Google Scholar.

Prépublications

  1. “Feshbach resonances of composite charge carrier states in atomically thin semiconductor heterostructures,” M.  Wagner, R. Ołdziejewski, F. Rose, V. Köder, C. Kuhlenkamp, A. İmamoğlu, et R. Schmidt.
    arXiv:2310.08729 [cond-mat.mes-hall].

Articles publiés

  1. “Operator product expansion coefficients from the nonperturbative functional renormalization group,” F. Rose, C. Pagani, et N. Dupuis.
    Phys. Rev. D 105, 065020 (2022), arXiv:2110.13174 [hep-th]. [PDF]
  2. “Disorder in order: Localization without randomness in a cold-atom system,” F. Rose et R. Schmidt.
    Phys. Rev. A 105, 013324 (2022), arXiv:2107.06931 [cond-mat.quant-gas]. [PDF]
  3. “Functional-renormalization-group approach to strongly coupled Bose-Fermi mixtures in two dimensions,” J. von Milczewski, F. Rose, et R. Schmidt.
    Phys. Rev. A 105, 013317 (2022), arXiv:2104.14017 [cond-mat.quant-gas]. [PDF]
  4. “Hall viscosity and conductivity of two-dimensional chiral superconductors,” F. Rose, O. Golan et S. Moroz.
    SciPost Phys. 9, 006 (2020), arXiv:2004.02590 [cond-mat.supr-con]. [PDF]
  5. “Nonperturbative renormalization-group approach preserving the momentum dependence of correlation functions,” F. Rose et N. Dupuis.
    Phys. Rev. B 97, 174514 (2018), arXiv:1801.03118 [cond-mat.stat-mech]. [PDF]
  6. “Superuniversal transport near a (2+1)-dimensional quantum critical point,” F. Rose et N. Dupuis.
    Phys. Rev. B 96, 100501(R) (2017), arXiv:1705.03905 [cond-mat.str-el]. [PDF]
  7. “Nonperturbative functional renormalization-group approach to transport in the vicinity of a (2+1)-dimensional O(N)-symmetric quantum critical point,” F. Rose et N. Dupuis.
    Phys. Rev. B 95, 014513 (2017), arXiv:1610.06476 [cond-mat.str-el]. [PDF]
  8. “Critical Casimir forces from the equation of state of quantum critical systems,” A. Rançon, L.-P. Henry, F. Rose, D. Lopes Cardozo, N. Dupuis, P. C. W. Holdsworth, et T. Roscilde.
    Phys. Rev. B 94, 140506(R) (2016), arXiv:1606.03205 [cond-mat.stat-mech]. [PDF]
  9. “Bound states of the φ4 model via the nonperturbative renormalization group,” F. Rose, F. Benitez, F. Léonard, et B. Delamotte.
    Phys. Rev. D 93, 125018 (2016), arXiv:1604.05285 [cond-mat.stat-mech]. [PDF]
  10. “Higgs amplitude mode in the vicinity of a (2+1)-dimensional quantum critical point: A nonperturbative renormalization-group approach,” F. Rose, F. Léonard, et N. Dupuis.
    Phys. Rev. B 91, 224501 (2015), arXiv:1503.08688 [cond-mat.quant-gas]. [PDF]
  11. “Spin- and valley-dependent magneto-optical properties of MoS2,” F. Rose, M. O. Goerbig, et F. Piéchon.
    Phys. Rev. B 88, 125438 (2013), arXiv:1307.2884 [cond-mat.mes-hall]. [PDF]
